title: [SO] SW & AP RMA - Service Provisioning LAN/WiFi Q3
description:
Description

Business Scope:
After the customer has ordered, the hardware will be purchased, pre-staged (if necessary) and sent out to the customer. The licenses have been purchased. Possibly needed additional services e.g. RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization i.e. send back defect equipment) Packages are purchased. If requested, the field service has been ordered. These new assets are documented in our asset database. All legal, regulatory and compliance rules are fulfilled (e.g. accounting/activation). Processes are highly automated.
acceptance_criteria: Check w whether SW & AP RMA procedure is developed
align on  RMA technical design for SW & AP
Processes are defined and tested including pre-staging if necessary.
Business scope Procurement and Supplier Task Hardware delivery and exchange (RMA) is fulfilled
